mapper.sql: EQUIPMENT_ID, ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME,TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_ID, CHANNEL_TEM, ADDRESS, ADCODE, CADCODE, PADCODE, LNG_LAT, FRAME_STRU, ICON, CREATOR, CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 100 ), CREATE_TIME, 20 ) AS CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 100 ), UPDATE_TIME, 20 ) AS UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from hq_equipment_info where 1=1 AND USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from hq_equipment_info where 1=1 AND TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into hq_equipment_info (EQUIPMENT_ID, EQUIPMENT_NAME,TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_ID, CHANNEL_TEM, ADDRESS, ADCODE, CADCODE, PADCODE, LNG_LAT, FRAME_STRU, ICON, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelTem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cadcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{padcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frameStru,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update hq_equipment_info
EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
